teamId.description: A team id in case you want to act on behalf of a team

name.description: A name to assign to the webhook

url.description: The URL ZEIT will post to when events happen

$block: A webhook subscription with an URL where ZEIT will POST events.

$ul: **configurationId**: An id that corresponds to the configuration that generated the token that was used to create the webhook
**createdAt**: Timestamp that tells when was the webhook created
**events**: An array with the event identifiers that the webhook can receive
**name**: A name for the webhook that serves as a canonical description
**ownerId**: Id of the owner which can be a user or a team
**url**: The URL where the POST request will be sent
